src:
Ini Bantahan Marcelo Tentang Asumsi Hubungan Spesial Real Madrid dan Liga Champions
06 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Marcelo membantah pandangan bahwa Real Madrid punya wajah berbeda ketika bermain di Liga Champions. Los Blancos memang akrab dengan trofi tersebut, tapi bukan berarti mereka bisa selalu tampil lebih baik di kompetisi itu.
Hubungan Los Blancos dengan Liga Champions memang tidak perlu diragukan. Mereka sudah mengoleksi 13 trofi si kuping besar, yang paling banyak dalam sejarah.
Madrid selalu disebut memiliki DNA Liga Champions, yakni kemampuan untuk tampil jauh lebih hebat di kompetisi tersebut. Memang, mentalitas skuad Madrid bukan sekadar isapan jempol.
Biar begitu, Marcelo membantah bahwa Madrid selalu tampil lebih apik di Liga Champions. Mengapa demikian? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
This is Marcelo's rebuttal about the assumption of a special relationship between Real Madrid and the Champions League
Nov 6 2019, 1:00 PM by Bola.net
Bola.net - Marcelo refutes the view that Real Madrid have a different face when playing in the Champions League. Los Blancos are familiar with the trophy, but that does not mean they can always perform better in the competition.
Los Blancos relationship with the Champions League is not in doubt. They have collected 13 big ear trophies, the most in history.
Madrid has always been called having the Champions League DNA, namely the ability to perform far greater in the competition. Indeed, the mentality of Madrid's squad is not just a figment.
Even so, Marcelo has denied that Madrid always look better in the Champions League. Why is that? Read below, Bolaneters!
